title: Kart Turismo Begins Development with a Bold Vision
content: Kart Turismo officially enters development, aiming to merge kart racing and local tourism in a way never seen before. The team is focused on creating an immersive experience based on Colombo, Paran√°.

title: Kart Turismo Joins GrapeTech Innovation Ecosystem
content: Kart Turismo is now incubated at GrapeTech, gaining access to mentorship, networking, and funding opportunities to accelerate its development.

title: Prototyping Begins: Early Track Layouts in Unity
content: The team is testing low-poly track layouts based on Colombo's real roads, refining kart handling, and experimenting with race mechanics.

title: Playtesting the First Driving Prototype
content: The first playtest session gave valuable feedback on kart controls, track readability, and the balance between arcade-style fun and realistic city layouts.

title: First Partnership Talks with Colombo's Tourism Office
content: Kart Turismo developers met with Secretaria de Turismo da Prefeitura de Colombo to explore collaborations that promote local tourism within the game.

title: Kart Turismo's Business Model Takes Shape
content: The team is refining a QR-code-based rewards system, incentivizing players to visit real-world locations for in-game and real-life benefits.

title: Early AI Prototyping: First NPC Racers Hit the Track
content: AI-controlled karts are now being tested, focusing on dynamic racing behavior and competitive opponents that adapt to different track conditions.

title: Kart Turismo Explores WebGL for Instant Play Access
content: The team is experimenting with WebGL builds, allowing instant access to the game on both desktop and mobile browsers.

title: Mapbox Integration: Testing Colombo's Terrain Data
content: Using Mapbox data, developers are testing real terrain elevation and road layouts to ensure Colombo's geography translates well into racing tracks.

title: First Community Brainstorming Session with Players
content: Players and business owners joined the first discussion session, sharing ideas on how the game can best represent Colombo and support local businesses.

title: Testing Different Race Modes: Time Trials & Checkpoint Races
content: Developers are experimenting with time trials, checkpoint races, and elimination modes to expand gameplay variety.

title: Kart Turismo Collaborates with Local Schools
content: The team is discussing partnerships with Colombo's schools to integrate educational and tourism awareness elements into the game.

title: New Business Partnership Model Under Development
content: A tiered rewards system is being developed, allowing businesses to offer progressive discounts and exclusive in-game perks based on player engagement.

title: First Multiplayer Tests: Online Races Coming Soon
content: The first multiplayer tests are underway, bringing competitive online racing to Kart Turismo! Developers are fine-tuning netcode for smooth gameplay.

title: Kart Turismo Secures Initial Funding for Expansion
content: Kart Turismo has secured its first round of funding, supporting expanded development, marketing efforts, and deeper business integrations.
